OMM500.name: Student Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine Practical Laboratory
OMM500.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM500.description: Elective course of didactic and clinical sessions which apply osteopathic principles and techniques on patients.

OMM511.name: Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine I
OMM511.description: Basic palpatory skills and clinical knowledge leading to osteopathic diagnosis and treatment.
OMM511.restrictions: Open to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM512.name: Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine II
OMM512.description: Continuation of OMM 511. Basic palpatory skills and clinical knowledge leading to osteopathic diagnosis and treatment.
OMM512.restrictions: Open to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM513.name: Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine III
OMM513.description: Continuation of OMM 512. Basic palpatory skills and clinical knowledge leading to osteopathic diagnosis and treatment.
OMM513.restrictions: Open to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM514.name: Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine IV
OMM514.description: Advanced osteopathic palpatory skills and clinical knowledge leading to osteopathic diagnosis and treatment.
OMM514.restrictions: Open to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM515.name: Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine V
OMM515.description: Continuation of OMM 514. Advanced osteopathic palpatory skills and clinical knowledge leading to osteopathic diagnosis and treatment.
OMM515.restrictions: Open to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM590.name: Special Problems in Biomechanics
OMM590.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM590.description: Each student works under faculty direction on an experimental, theoretical, or applied problem.
OMM590.restrictions: Open only to graduate and graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine. Approval of department.

OMM601.name: Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine Clerkship
OMM601.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM601.description: Advanced training in the diagnosis of musculoskeletal dysfunction and application of osteopathic manipulative techniques.
OMM601.restrictions: Open only to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM602.name: Osteopathic Principles and Practice Clerkship
OMM602.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM602.description: Integration of osteopathic manipulative medicine and osteopathic principles and practice during clerkship rotations.
OMM602.restrictions: Open to graduate-professional students in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM604.name: Essential Clinical Skills for the Senior Medical Student
OMM604.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM604.description: Longitudinal experience addressing essential skills for senior osteopathic medical students.
OMM604.restrictions: Open to seniors in the College of Osteopathic Medicine.

OMM800.name: Special Topics
OMM800.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM800.description: Directed study in topics of biomechanics.

OMM890.name: Independent Study
OMM890.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
OMM890.description: Individual or group work related to biomechanics and/or neuromuscular system.

OMM899.name: Master's Thesis Research
OMM899.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
